title: S17 Ep129: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Hitchhiking Aliens, Falling Coffins and Randy Ghosts Edition w/ Beer City Bruiser
itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Hitchhiking Aliens, Falling Coffins and Randy Ghosts Edition w/ Beer City Bruiser
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Hitchhiking Aliens, Falling Coffins and Randy Ghosts w/ Beer City Bruiser!

The world is getting deeper into Spooky Season, and the stories are getting weirder, the veil is getting thinner and people are having supernatural experiences, scary, strange, and hilarious!  Also,  Cruiser and Bruiser have gathered some interesting Supernatural stories from around the world this week just for you!

This week, While NASA hires former astronauts to figure out Alien sightings, regular internet surfers figure out an alien hitchhiking with a stranger!  A cemetary in Italy has decided to stop taking care of it's building and watch the coffins fall! Another sighting of Nessie on Loch Ness, making six this year! and , The scariest story of the year is at the end of this podcast!  So revolting, so terrifying... it will want to make you wanna scrub your brain with bleach!     

Check out the Alien hitchhiking in the back seat with the woman in this story:  https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/woman-people-gobsmacked-claims-spot-28312902?ICID=ref_fark

Is House of The Dragon just a rehash of Shrek, watch the videos comparing them here: https://www.indy100.com/viral/house-of-the-dragon-shrek?utm_source=fark&utm_medium=website&utm_content=link&ICID=ref_fark

Check out our new site, https://www.darknessradioshow.com/ to find all of our old archives, leave us a voice message for parashare, read our blogs, and much more!

To learn more about Microdose Gummies go to Microdose.com and use code: darkness to get free shipping & 30% off your first order

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
